entry.title: GenEFT: Understanding Statics and Dynamics of Model Generalization via Effective Theory

link.title: GenEFT: Understanding Statics and Dynamics of Model Generalization via Effective Theory

entry.content: We present GenEFT: an effective theory framework for shedding light on the statics and dynamics of neural network generalization, and illustrate it with graph learning examples.

author.name: David D. Baek, Ziming Liu, Max Tegmark

entry.summary: We present GenEFT: an effective theory framework for shedding light on the statics and dynamics of neural network generalization, and illustrate it with graph learning examples.
